action.action-desc: Mr. Blumenauer (for himself, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Buchanan, and Ms. Slaughter) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Animal Welfare Act to require humane treatment of animals by Federal Government facilities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the The Animal Welfare in Agricultural Research Endeavors Act or the AWARE Act.
Section 14 of the Animal Welfare Act (7 U.S.C. 2144) is amendedâ€”

For purposes of the application of standards and other requirements described in paragraph (1) to a Federal research facility or any other department, agency, or instrumentality of the United States having laboratory animal facilities, the exclusions contained in section 2(g)(3) shall not apply.
